widget.name: Global Game Jam Stream Viewer
widget.description:
An interface for viewing 4 GGJ videostreams simultaneously. It's roughly equivalent of making 4 searches at http://globalgamejam.org/streams and placing the html together in a single window.
Each window has a list of sites. A site is added every time the text in the line above is changed (tab away). The numbers control how fast the list for each window will advance.
widget.author: Fredrik Ludvigsen
